reviews.review_content:
Prof. Dubin gave the most organized lectures I've ever experienced. If you are tired of needing notes for your notes... this will be a refreshing change.  He does a lot of work with articles on homosexuality so if you are a down with that you'll fins things interesting.   He is not an easy grader, but if you go to class and do the readings you will be fine.  
Workload:
Readings & a few papers
